memberships.title: Non-Profit Membership Benefits
memberships.description: A Non-Profit Membership offers essential resources for organizations looking to make a positive impact. Members enjoy access to exclusive funding opportunities, networking events, and tailored support for grant applications.
additionalBenefits: Spotlight position on the homepage for a limited time

memberships.title: Bronze Membership Benefits
memberships.description: Bronze Membership provides basic benefits, including access to online resources, participation in workshops, and a subscription to our monthly newsletter. Ideal for small organizations looking to grow.
additionalBenefits: Access to exclusive webinars and networking events

memberships.title: Silver Membership Benefits
memberships.description: Silver Membership enhances your experience with additional benefits such as priority access to events, discounted rates on services, and exclusive member-only webinars, designed to support your organizational goals.

memberships.title: Gold Membership Benefits
memberships.description: Gold Membership offers comprehensive benefits, including all Silver Membership perks plus personalized consulting services, exclusive networking opportunities with industry leaders, and advanced training programs to ensure your organization's success.
additionalBenefits: Guaranteed feature placement on the homepage
